items.sentence: I wish Tom hadn\'t told Mary I\'d been in prison.
I won\'t be able to finish if you don\'t help me.
Tom was worried that you wouldn\'t like his gift.
Tom said that he was eager to eat lunch with her.
Tom said that he was planning to be here by 2:30.
Tom said there was a party at your place tonight.
Tom said this kind of thing happens all the time.
One of the twins is alive, but the other is dead.
Do you have any tickets for today\'s performance?
I\'d like a wake-up call at six tomorrow morning.
